title: Ep. 74  - How to Make Money Trading Currencies
itunes:title: How to Make Money Trading Currencies
description: Andrew Hororwitz, host of the Disciplined Investor, talks currencies, the end of QE2, Apple, and the best sectors to invest in today. Frank breaks down Alcoa's weak earnings and tells us why most large-cap banks should be avoided.
